item.title: Merz Fails in First Parliament Vote to Become Germany’s Next Chancellor
item.description: The setback was likely temporary, but it was historic. No modern German chancellor has ever failed to secure the job on a first ballot in Parliament.

item.title: Friedrich Merz, Germany’s New Leader, Leaps Into a World of Crises
item.description: Friedrich Merz is poised to become chancellor at a challenging time for Germany. But in a first round of voting in Parliament, he fell short Tuesday o...

item.title: Ukrainian Drone Attack Forces Restriction of Flights Near Moscow, Russia Says
item.description: The volley comes just days before a planned parade in the capital to mark the 80th anniversary of the end of World War II in Europe.

item.title: Carney to Meet With Trump on a High-Stakes Visit to the White House

item.title: Pope Francis Made the Catholic Church More Global Than Ever. What Does That Mean for the Conclave?
item.description: Francis appointed most of the cardinals. But they may not choose another pope like him.
